should add heading anchor (simple)
.
# test
.
<h1 id="test"><a name="test" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>test</h1>
.


should add anchors to multiple headings
.
# head 1

some para text

## head 2

more para text
.
<h1 id="head-1"><a name="head-1" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>head 1</h1>
<p>some para text</p>
<h2 id="head-2"><a name="head-2" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>head 2</h2>
<p>more para text</p>
.


should cope with fairly complex heading text
.
##### a _b_ **c** `d` "e"
.
<h5 id="a-b-c-d-e"><a name="a-b-c-d-e" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>a <em>b</em> <strong>c</strong> <code>d</code> &quot;e&quot;</h5>
.


should add anchors to headings within other block elements
.
> # head 1
>
> some para text
>
> ## head 2
>
> more para text
.
<blockquote>
<h1 id="head-1"><a name="head-1" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>head 1</h1>
<p>some para text</p>
<h2 id="head-2"><a name="head-2" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>head 2</h2>
<p>more para text</p>
</blockquote>
.


slugification should match a link that is the text with spaces removed
.
# **Hello** `こんにちは`
[Link label](hello-こんにちは)
.
<h1 id="hello-%E3%81%93%E3%82%93%E3%81%AB%E3%81%A1%E3%81%AF"><a name="hello-%E3%81%93%E3%82%93%E3%81%AB%E3%81%A1%E3%81%AF" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a><strong>Hello</strong> <code>こんにちは</code></h1>
<p><a href="hello-%E3%81%93%E3%82%93%E3%81%AB%E3%81%A1%E3%81%AF">Link label</a></p>
.
